item.title: Starting New Project [Planning]
item.description: The Planning: I started a new project. Unnamed yet, but I already know about what will be. It looks a bit silly but I want to do a money manager. An application that you can add entries for expenses and incomes. How I started? Planning! I am planning the database. I intend to use PostgreSQL for my database. I am using dbdiagram.io to create my schemas dbdiagram.io On the left side I wrote in code what I want to represent in my tables.
